whatWeDo.counsel.title: Counsel at First Appearance
whatWeDo.counsel.description: Ensuring everyone has access to legal counsel from their very first court appearance.We believe early representation leads to fairer outcomes and fewer unnecessary detentions.
whatWeDo.counsel.imageAlt: Lady Justice statue representing early legal counsel.
whatWeDo.office.title: Office of Police Oversight
whatWeDo.office.description: We work with city offices and community leaders to monitor and improve policing practices and outcomes.
whatWeDo.office.imageAlt: Community leaders and police officials meeting to review policing practices.
whatWeDo.dismissal.title: Dismissal & Diversion Opportunities
whatWeDo.dismissal.description: We identify options for dismissal, diversion, or reduced charges before trial to prevent unnecessary incarceration.
whatWeDo.dismissal.imageAlt: Attorney reviewing dismissal documents with legal case files.
whatWeDo.community.title: Community-Powered Support
whatWeDo.community.description: We help families understand the legal process and actively support their loved ones as part of the defense team.
whatWeDo.community.imageAlt: Community members attending a legal education workshop.
whatWeDo.publicDefenders.title: Public Defenders' Office Support
whatWeDo.publicDefenders.description: We advocate for fair caseloads, better resources, and collaborative policy reforms to improve representation quality.
whatWeDo.publicDefenders.imageAlt: Public defenders standing outside a courthouse.
whatWeDo.rightsEducation.title: Rights Education & Advocacy
whatWeDo.rightsEducation.description: We support treatment, education, and community-based solutions as effective alternatives to punishment.
whatWeDo.rightsEducation.imageAlt: Classroom session teaching legal rights and justice reform topics.
